price: 103. Et la plupart des hommes, quoi que tu fasses, ne sont pas croyants.
arabic: وَمَآ أَكۡثَرُ ٱلنَّاسِ وَلَوۡ حَرَصۡتَ بِمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wamā aktharu al-nāsi walaw ḥaraṣta bimu'minīna
